```{r table-appB-spawner-dat, echo=FALSE}
#dat.spawners defined in setup.Rmd
dat=dat.spawners
Yr1 = min(dat$Year)
Yr2 = max(dat$Year)

#naive model error
#def of MASE is MAE/naive error
NE=mean(abs(dat$spawners0-dat$spawners1))

# Get names
getcovtit <- function(covname){
  if(covname=="SST.4.mon10to12.") covtit = "$V_t$ = Oct-Dec SST (L1)"
  if(covname=="SST.2.5.mon6to9.") covtit =  "$V_t$ = Jun-Sep ns-SST (L2)"
  if(covname=="SST.2.5.mon9to10.") covtit =  "$V_t$ = Sep-Oct ns-SST (L1)"
  if(covname=="SST.2.10.mon3to5.") covtit =  "$V_t$ = Mar-May r-SST (S5)"
  if(covname=="SST.4.mon7to9.") covtit =  "$V_t$ = Jul-Sep SST"
  if(covname=="SST.4.mon6to9.") covtit =  "$V_t$ = Jun-Sep SST"
  if(covname=="SST.4.mon7to12.") covtit =  "$V_t$ = Jul-Dec SST"
  if(covname=="SST.4.mon1to3.") covtit =  "$V_t$ = Jan-Mar SST"
  if(covname=="SST.4.mon1to12.") covtit =  "$V_t$ = Jan-Dec SST"
  if(covname=="SST.4.mon9to10.") covtit =  "$V_t$ = Sep-Oct SST"
  if(covname=="We.UPW.mon1to2.") covtit = "$V_t$ = Jan-Feb Ekman Pumping (L1)"
  if(covname=="SST.4.mon1to12.") covtit =  "$V_t$ = Jan-Dec SST"
  if(covname=="SST.2.10.mon7to12.") covtit =  "$V_t$ = Jul-Dec r-SST"
  if(covname=="precip.gpcp.kerala.mon6to7.") covtit = "$V_t$ = Jun-Jul Precipitation (S1)"
  if(covname=="precip.gpcp.kerala.mon4to5.") covtit = "$V_t$ = Apr-May Precipitation (S2)"
  if(covname=="SST.2.5.mon10to12.") covtit =  "$V_t$ = Oct-Dec ns-SST (L1)"
  if(covname=="Bakun.UPW.mon6to9.") covtit = "$V_t$ = Jun-Sep Bakun-UPW (L2)"
  if(covname=="EMTperp.UPW.mon6to9.") covtit = "$V_t$ = Jun-Sep EMT-UPW (L2)"
  if(covname=="We.UPW.mon6to9.") covtit = "$V_t$ = Jun-Sep Ekman Pumping-UPW (L2)"
  if(covname=="SST.UPW.4.mon6to9.") covtit = "$V_t$ = Jun-Sep UPW (L2)"
  if(covname=="SST.2.5.mon6to9.") covtit = "$V_t$ = Jun-Sep ns-SST (L2)"
  if(covname=="SST.2.5.3.yr.runsum.") covtit = "$V_t$ = 2.5-year ave ns-SST (A1)"
  if(covname=="ONI.mon1to12.") covtit = "$V_t$ = ONI (A2)"
  if(covname=="DMI.mon9to11.") covtit = "$V_t$ = Sep-Nov DMI (A3)"
  
  return(covtit)
}

```

```{r table-appB-spawner-precip, echo=FALSE}
#set up table
seltable = data.frame(
  Model=paste("base model (M) ", Yr1,"-", Yr2, " data", sep=""), 
  Residual.df="", 
  MASE="",
  Adj.R2="", 
  F="", 
  p.value="", 
  AIC="", stringsAsFactors=FALSE)

#set up the cov0 and cov1 variables
covname="precip.gpcp.kerala.mon6to7."
dat$cov0=dat[[paste(covname, "0", sep="")]]
dat$cov1=dat[[paste(covname, "1", sep="")]]
m1 = gam(spawners0 ~ s(nspawners1, sp=0.6), data=dat)
m2 = gam(spawners0 ~ s(nspawners1, sp=0.6) + cov0, data=dat)
m3 = gam(spawners0 ~ s(nspawners1, sp=0.6) + s(cov0, sp=0.6), data=dat)
m4 = gam(spawners0 ~ s(nspawners1, sp=0.6) + s(cov0, sp=0.6) + cov1, data=dat)
m5 = gam(spawners0 ~ s(nspawners1, sp=0.6) + s(cov0, sp=0.6) + s(cov1, sp=0.6), data=dat)
a=anova(m1,m2,m3,m4,m5, test="F")

# header M1 for all models

#model 1
i=1; mod=paste("m",i,sep="")
aa = summary(get(mod))
tmp1=data.frame(
  Model="1. $ln(S_t)$ = $\\alpha$ + $s(ln(W_{t-1}))$ + $\\epsilon_t$",
  Residual.df=round(a[["Resid. Df"]][i],digits=1), 
  MASE=round(mean(abs(residuals(get(mod))))/NE,digits=3), 
  Adj.R2=100*round(aa$r.sq, digits=3), 
  F="", p.value="", 
  AIC=round(AIC(get(mod)), digits=2))
seltable=rbind(seltable,tmp1)

## Add space
tmp1 = data.frame(Model="\\kern 1em", Residual.df="\\kern 1em", MASE="\\kern 1em", Adj.R2="\\kern 1em", F="\\kern 1em", p.value="\\kern 1em", AIC="")
seltable=rbind(seltable,tmp1)

for(covname in c("precip.gpcp.kerala.mon6to7.", "precip.gpcp.kerala.mon4to5.")){
  covtit <- getcovtit(covname)

#var header
seltable = rbind(seltable, data.frame(Model=covtit, Residual.df="", MASE="", Adj.R2="", F="", p.value="", AIC="", stringsAsFactors=FALSE))

#set up the cov0 and cov1 variables
dat$cov0=dat[[paste(covname, "0", sep="")]]
dat$cov1=dat[[paste(covname, "1", sep="")]]
m1 = gam(spawners0 ~ s(nspawners1, sp=0.6), data=dat)
m2 = gam(spawners0 ~ s(nspawners1, sp=0.6) + cov0, data=dat)
m3 = gam(spawners0 ~ s(nspawners1, sp=0.6) + s(cov0, sp=0.6), data=dat)
m4 = gam(spawners0 ~ s(nspawners1, sp=0.6) + s(cov0, sp=0.6) + cov1, data=dat)
m5 = gam(spawners0 ~ s(nspawners1, sp=0.6) + s(cov0, sp=0.6) + s(cov1, sp=0.6), data=dat)
a=anova(m1,m2,m3,m4,m5, test="F")

#model 2
i=2; mod=paste("m",i,sep="")
aa = summary(get(mod))
tmp1=data.frame(
  Model="2. $ln(S_t)$ = M + $\\beta V_t$",
  Residual.df=round(a[["Resid. Df"]][i],digits=1), 
  MASE=round(mean(abs(residuals(get(mod))))/NE,digits=3), 
  Adj.R2=100*round(aa$r.sq, digits=3), 
  F=round(a$F[i],digits=2), p.value = round(a[["Pr(>F)"]][i], digits=3), 
  AIC = round(AIC(get(mod)), digits=2))
seltable=rbind(seltable,tmp1)

#model 3
i=3; mod=paste("m",i,sep="")
aa = summary(get(mod))
tmp1=data.frame(
  Model="3. $ln(S_t)$ = M + $s(V_t)$",
  Residual.df=round(a[["Resid. Df"]][i],digits=1), 
  MASE=round(mean(abs(residuals(get(mod))))/NE,digits=3), 
  Adj.R2=100*round(aa$r.sq, digits=3), 
  F=round(a$F[i],digits=2), p.value = round(a[["Pr(>F)"]][i], digits=3), 
  AIC = round(AIC(get(mod)), digits=2))
seltable=rbind(seltable,tmp1)

## Add space
tmp1 = data.frame(Model="\\kern 1em", Residual.df="\\kern 1em", MASE="\\kern 1em", Adj.R2="\\kern 1em", F="\\kern 1em", p.value="\\kern 1em", AIC="")
seltable=rbind(seltable,tmp1)
}
# Remove space at bottom
seltable=seltable[1:(dim(seltable)[1]-1),]
```

```{r print-tableAppB-precip, echo=FALSE}
colnames(seltable)=c("Model", "Residual df", "MASE", "Adj.R2", "F", "p value", "AIC")
if(isLatex) colnames(seltable)=c("Model", "\\shortstack{Residual\\\\df}", "MASE", "\\shortstack{Adj.\\\\R2}", "F", "\\shortstack{p\\\\value}", "AIC")

thecap=paste("Model selection tests of GPCP precipitation as an explanatory variable for the catch $S_t$ during monsoon months (Jul-Sep) using", Yr1, "to", Yr2,  "data.  The data range is determined by the years for which SST was available in order to use a consistent dataset across covariate tests.  The base model (M) with prior catch dependency was selected independently (Appendix A). To the base model, covariates are added. $V_t$ is the covariate in same calendar year as the Jul-Sep catch. The specific hypothesis (Table ", ref("tab:hypotheses"), ") being tested is noted in parentheses. The models are tested as nested sets.  Thus 1, 2a, 3a is a set and 1, 2b, 3b is another set. MASE is the mean absolute square error (residuals).")
fullcap=paste("Table ", ref(paste0(figset,"spawner-model-precip"), pre=pre), ". ", thecap, sep="")
kable(seltable, align="lcccccc", caption=fullcap, row.names=FALSE, escape=FALSE)
```

```{r print-tableAppB-upw, echo=FALSE}
colnames(seltable)=c("Model", "Residual df", "MASE", "Adj.R2", "F", "p value", "AIC")
if(isLatex) colnames(seltable)=c("Model", "\\shortstack{Residual\\\\df}", "MASE", "\\shortstack{Adj.\\\\R2}", "F", "\\shortstack{p\\\\value}", "AIC")

thecap=paste("Model selection tests of sea surface temperature off the Kerala coast (up to 80km offshore in boxes 2-5 in Figure 1), and upwelling indices as the explanatory variables ($V_t$) for the catch during monsoon months (Jul-Sep) using ", Yr1," to ", Yr2, " data.  The hypothesis tested (Table ", ref("tab:hypotheses"), ") is noted in parentheses. Four summer upwelling indices were tested. The nearshore-offshore temperature diferential (UPW), which is the offshore  minus nearshore SST, the average nearshore SST along the Kerala coast (boxes 2-5), the Ekman Mass Transport perpendicular to the coast, and Ekman Pumping at the southern tip of India. See Table ", ref(paste0(figset,"spawner-model-precip"), pre=pre), " for an explanation of the models.")
fullcap=paste("Table ", ref(paste0(figset,"spawner-model-upw"), pre=pre), ". ", thecap, sep="")
kable(seltable, align="lcccccc", caption=fullcap, row.names=FALSE, escape=FALSE)
```

```{r table-appB-spawner-enso, echo=FALSE}
## ENSO, A TESTs
#set up table
seltable = data.frame(
  Model=paste("base model (M) ", Yr1,"-", Yr2, " data", sep=""), 
  Residual.df="", 
  MASE="",
  Adj.R2="", 
  F="", 
  p.value="", 
  AIC="", stringsAsFactors=FALSE)

#set up the cov0 and cov1 variables
covname="precip.gpcp.kerala.mon6to7."
dat$cov0=dat[[paste(covname, "0", sep="")]]
dat$cov1=dat[[paste(covname, "1", sep="")]]
m1 = gam(spawners0 ~ s(nspawners1, sp=0.6), data=dat)
m2 = gam(spawners0 ~ s(nspawners1, sp=0.6) + cov0, data=dat)
a=anova(m1,m2, test="F")

# header M1 for all models

#model 1
i=1; mod=paste("m",i,sep="")
aa = summary(get(mod))
tmp1=data.frame(
  Model="1. $ln(S_t)$ = $\\alpha$ + $s(ln(W_{t-1}))$ + $\\epsilon_t$",
  Residual.df=round(a[["Resid. Df"]][i],digits=1), 
  MASE=round(mean(abs(residuals(get(mod))))/NE,digits=3), 
  Adj.R2=100*round(aa$r.sq, digits=3), 
  F="", p.value="", 
  AIC=round(AIC(get(mod)), digits=2))
```

```{r print-tableAppB-enso, echo=FALSE}
thecap=paste("Model selection tests of the multiyear average nearshore sea surface temperature and ENSO indices as the explanatory variables ($V$) for the catch during summer months (Jul-Sep) using ", Yr1," to ", Yr2, " data.  The hypothesis tested (Table ", ref("tab:hypotheses"), ") is noted in parentheses. The ENSO indices were the ONI index averaged over all months in the calendar year and the DMI index for Sep-Nov. The 2.5-year average nearshore SST is the average for Jan-Jun in the current calendar year and the prior 2 calendar years (30 months total). Thus the average does not include any months during the Jul-Sep catch.  See Table ", ref(paste0(figset,"spawner-model-precip"), pre=pre), " for an explanation of the models.")
```
